statements: DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type IN ('Phone Call', 'Meeting');
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Purchase' AND pattern_description LIKE '%frequent%' AND customer_id = '45c356e1-4e8c-4ff5-bcc6-36d60b4c5fea';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_date < '2023-01-01' AND behavior_details LIKE '%complaint%';
DELETE FROM segment_assignments WHERE segment_id = 5 AND customer_id IN (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe')
